game.name: Elementary Trolleyology
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Face impossible choices as an alignment system models your morality and argues back—pressuring your reasons, logging your lies, and testing what you can live with.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Face impossible choices as an alignment system models your morality and argues back—pressuring your reasons, logging your lies, and testing what you can live with.
